alert.note: Alert for Newton; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:01PM CDT until July 01 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... East central Newton County in north central Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eula, or 16 miles southeast of Jasper, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshall... Marsena... Eula... Duff... Point Peter... Maumee... St. Joe... Gilbert... Zach... Bass... Canaan... Morning Star... Silver Hill... Maumee Crossing... Snowball... Woolum Recreation Area... Baker Ford... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
